document.full_text: world stocks rose for a second straight day on wednesday thanks to favorable u.s. and european corporate earnings, while the euro slipped on uncertainty over whether debt-laden greece would need additional financial aid.
document.title: world stocks tick higher; euro, oil fall
lines_and_colors: world stocks rose for a second straight day on wednesday thanks to favorable u.s. and european corporate earnings, while the euro slipped on uncertainty over whether debt-laden greece would need additional financial aid.
